- Play more games on the top-left menu.

Description:

This game is a thrilling browser extension game that brings the excitement of the classic fighting game franchise. Step into the world of epic battles, legendary martial artists, and intense combat as you take on challenging opponents offline.

Key Features:

Experience the authentic gameplay of Street Fighter with its iconic characters, special moves, and combos. Engage in intense one-on-one battles that require skill, strategy, and quick reflexes.

Variety of Fighters: Choose your favorite fighter from a roster of legendary characters, each with their unique fighting styles and special attacks. Whether you prefer Ryu's powerful Hadouken or Chun-Li's lightning-fast kicks, there's a character for every playstyle.

Offline Mode: Play anywhere, without needing an internet connection. Enjoy uninterrupted gaming sessions and hone your skills against AI-controlled opponents.

Challenging AI Opponents: Face off against a range of AI opponents with varying difficulty levels. Start as a novice and work your way up to becoming a master. The AI adapts to your skill level, providing a challenging experience for both newcomers and veterans.

Training Mode: Perfect your moves and combos in the training mode. Practice your special moves, learn intricate combinations, and become a formidable fighter.

Multiplayer Coming Soon: While currently an offline single-player experience, "Street Fighter Offline" has plans for future updates to introduce local multiplayer modes, allowing you to challenge friends in epic battles.
